author: sproul
content: I had trouble getting Sepolia peers with a fresh Geth instance, and someone else in the Lighthouse Discord noticed the same. Are Geth's bootnodes up-to-date for Sepolia?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: There are only two sepolia bootnodes, one geth. Both are online but have too many peers. Peering should just work over the dht and the dns list, just not that many nodes on there

author: potuz
content: Hi, what does the EL do if I send twice the same FCU with the same payload attributes for the next slot, does it restart block production or does it ignore the second call? Is there any penalty in calling twice?

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: If the attributes are exactly the same, we don't start a new task. If you change them up a bit, we will start a new building task

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Having two tasks building at the same time costs cpu

author: potuz
content: Thanks a lot Marius, I was hoping for this, hopefully other ELs do something similar

author: potuz
content: There are a few edge cases where I sort of can't avoid calling twice with the same attributes
